description.value:
+2 Penetration against Targets benefitting from cover. Medals can't be acquired, only earned. Looks like a Bronze Star inlaid with a teardrop-shaped ruby.

Requirements

Distinguished Service Medal: Capture or Kill an enemy Rebel General.

Effect: Special

Notes: -
